sentences.sentence: The value of India frustrated between 2010 and 2015; while Britain and China decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.
There is an unusual drop in 2013 of India.

sentences.sentence: The value of India frustrated between 2010 and 2015; while Britain and China decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.
There is an unusual drop in 2013 of India.
